metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14733 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has multiple heap-based buffer overflows in CradLoader::load()in rad.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: adplug package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
